name: Tiny Dragons
storyline:
Welcome to Tiny Dragons! Restore an ancient dragon city through a storyline full of adventures and twists. 
 
Become a Dragon Keeper: summon dragon eggs through a magical portal, beat match-3 levels, rebuild different areas of the city, unveil it’s story and mysteries it holds! 
Meet the Wise Man and a bunch of cute dragons that will help you restore the city to its former glory.
summary:
In the Match 3 Puzzle game Tiny Dragons, players come to the rescue of the Wise Man Sang Po and help him restore the Ancient Dragon City to its former glory. Through hundreds of match 3 levels and with the help of power-ups, players collect the flames of energy necessary to rebuild the different islands and build the Dragon City, which they can customize to their liking with various design choices. Furthermore, throughout their exciting quest, players will find hidden dragon eggs to hatch and revive adorable tiny dragons, which players can name and interact with. Together with their dragons, players will rebuild the Ancient Dragon City while an exciting storyline unfolds. In addition, players have a daily wheel of fortune with helpful rewards waiting for them. 
 
Tiny Dragons is free to play, though some in-game items can also be purchased for real money.
